text: June Huh (; born 1983) is an American mathematician. He is a professor at Princeton University. He was a professor at Stanford University and the Institute for Advanced Studies. He was awarded the Fields Medal in 2022. He is known for finding the link between algebraic geometry and combinatorics. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Fields Medalists Category:American mathematicians Category:Scientists from California Category:People from Stanford, California Category:Princeton University faculty
title: June Huh
